backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining data models and endpoints for leadership word submissions, resilient leadership activities, and per-user cycling quotes for two activities, with persistent storage and basic validation.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report documenting three frontend features related to fetching per-user quotes from the canister, including affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten high-level summaries of all major frontend files, covering routing, pages, components, hooks, styles, and recent feature updates.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, light/dark theme variables, chart colors, and base element styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application bootstrap configuring TanStack Router routes, wrapping all pages in AppShell and ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Shared layout component providing header navigation, authentication controls with Internet Identity, responsive mobile menu, and footer wrapper for all pages.
frontend/src/components/LeadershipWordPa: UI component that fetches and visualizes aggregated leadership word counts as a top-10 horizontal bar chart with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/MicroSolutionsCo: React component that fetches and displays community-submitted micro-solutions, handling loading and empty states and mapping challenge types to readable labels.
frontend/src/components/PageSection.tsx: Simple layout wrapper component that renders children inside a responsive, centered section with consistent padding and max width.
frontend/src/components/SignInGate.tsx: Authentication gate component that requires Internet Identity login before rendering children, otherwise showing a sign-in prompt and button.
frontend/src/content/proposalContent.ts: Static content module exporting proposal metadata, author bio, abstracts, and learning outcomes for the Institution Hero presentation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook managing Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout actions, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as leadership words, micro-solutions, activities, and quotes via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark color palettes, and base typography and layout styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app and wraps it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ActivitiesPage.tsx: Renders an overview page listing two interactive activities, pulling titles/goals/descriptions from proposalContent and linking to their respective routes.
frontend/src/pages/Activity1LeadershipWo: Implements Activity 1 where signed-in users submit a single leadership word with reflections, then receive a generated affirmation and a fetched inspirational quote.
frontend/src/pages/Activity2ResilientLea: Implements Activity 2 where users submit a resilience challenge, responses, and a micro-solution, with validation feedback, quotes, and community sharing.
frontend/src/pages/BioPage.tsx: Displays an author bio page with background information, organization, social media links, and international experience sourced from proposalContent.
Shows a list of learning outcomes for the session, iterating over proposalContent.learningOutcomes in a styled layout.
frontend/src/pages/OverviewPage.tsx: Provides a landing overview with hero banner, abstract content, and quick links to activities and learning outcomes using proposalContent.
frontend/src/pages/ReferencesPage.tsx: Lists academic and research references supporting the session, rendered from proposalContent.references.
frontend/src/pages/SessionOutlinePage.ts: File exists but currently contains no implementation or exported component.
frontend/src/pages/SlidesPage.tsx: File exists but currently contains no implementation or exported component.
frontend/src/pages/TakeawaysPage.tsx: Renders key takeaways for the session, displaying titled insights and descriptions from proposalContent.takeaways.
frontend/src/utils/activity1Affirmations: Defines input types and a deterministic generator that creates leadership affirmation messages based on a chosen word, personal reflections, and action steps, using themed templates with academic citations.
frontend/src/utils/activity2Validation.t: Generates a validation message and aligned academic citation for a userâ€™s micro-solution by thematically matching input text against a reference list and selecting a deterministic citation.
Defines stable UI string keys for leadership challenge types and maps them to backend ChallengeType enum values for submission.
frontend/src/utils/quoteFormatting.ts: Formats backend QuoteGenre enum values into user-friendly franchise names for display in the UI.
frontend/src/utils/starWarsQuotes.ts: Provides a curated list of Star Wars quotes with attribution and a deterministic selector function based on a numeric seed.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Normalizes unknown or backend error values into clear, user-facing English messages covering initialization, validation, network, and generic failures.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, content paths, theme extensions (colors, fonts, animations), container settings, and integrated plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata and current feature inventory for the ICP-based React and Motoko web app, including authentication, content modules, activities, UI framework, and build scaffolding.
